page.title: 08PUPIL'S SCHOOLDAY.
page.content: {08.15}Got up,dressed,had breakfast {08.30}Mum took me to Manor School {08.50}Registered with my tutor {09.20}French lesson,did a worksheet {10.05}Biology lesson,Birds + Eggs {10.50}Mid _ Morning break,ate crisps {11.05}Maths lesson,long division {12.00}English lesson,Animal Project {12.40}Mum collected me for lunch {13.45}Arrived at school for register {13.50}Drew a picture,caretakers house {14.40}French lesson, linguistics {15.30}Mum collected me,hometime {15.50}Fed my cat Mocksie on cat meat {16.00}Changed clothes,watched t.v {17.00}Ate bread and jam for tea {18.00}I did some knitting,scarf {18.45}Relaxed and listened to music {19.00}Decided to haue a bath {19.30}Watched television, cover up {21.00}Went to bed.
